text: @SethAbramson I don’t understand the rush to get kids back in campus! At least wait till January. This is WAY too soon. FL cases have skyrocketed. Now kids are being crammed into dorms. On top of it, it will be FLU season AND #COVID19 ! I have a HUGE discomfort with this. 😡 @AuburnU
